type.name: AqtOptions
type.prop: Optional data to send to the server with the request.
How to send data: `json` to serialise JSON data and `form` for url-encoded transmission with `json` mode by default.
Headers to use for the request.
Add the `Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate` header automatically to indicate to the server that it can send a compressed response.
What HTTP method to use to send data.
Whether to return a buffer instead of a string.
Whether to stop the request after response headers were received, without waiting for the data.
